- Financial Concepts Accuracy: The student clearly applied the WACC formula components (CAPM cost of equity, after‑tax cost of debt, market-value weights) and produced numeric WACC results and sensitivity scenarios, while also acknowledging key assumptions and limitations. - Technical Implementation: The student ran multiple sensitivity scenarios and reported specific WACC results and a WACC curve interpretation, showing correct conceptual and numerical sensitivity analysis.
